00095 
00096 void Comparator::compare(){
00097 
00098         FileReader fileReader;
00099         ifstream file;
00100         stringstream filename;
00101         vector<string> gtMetricNames;
00102         vector<string> *vecGtMetrics = new vector<string>[vecMethodNames.size()];
00103         vector<string> *vecMsMetrics= new vector<string>[vecMethodNames.size()];
00104         vector<string> vecSeperatedMsMetrics;
00105         vector<string> msMetricNames;
00106         vector<string> vecSeperatedGtMetrics;
00107         int noOfGtMetrics =0;
00108         int noOfMsMetrics =0;
00109 
00110 
00111         //reading files into the corresponding vectors
00112 
00113         for(unsigned int i=0; i<vecMethodNames.size();i++){
00114 
00115                 //Getting GtMetrics
00116                 filename.str("");
00117                 filename.clear();
00118                 filename << path << vecMethodNames[i] <<GtMetricsBaseName;
00119                 fileReader.toStringVector(filename.str(),vecGtMetrics[i]);
00120 
00121                 //Getting MsMetrics
00122                 filename.str("");
00123                 filename.clear();
00124                 filename << path<<vecMethodNames[i] <<MsMetricsBaseName;
00125                 fileReader.toStringVector(filename.str(),vecMsMetrics[i]);
00126         }
00127 
00128 
00129         if (vecGtMetrics[0].size() > 0 ) {
00130 
00131                 //Plotting Gt based metric comparison
00132                 boost::split(vecSeperatedGtMetrics, vecGtMetrics[0][0], boost::is_any_of(","));
00133                 noOfGtMetrics = vecSeperatedGtMetrics.size();
00134                 //setting metric names
00135                 gtMetricNames.push_back("Occupacy of the region");
00136                 gtMetricNames.push_back("Correct Detection (%)");
00137                 gtMetricNames.push_back("No of oversegmented regions");
00138                 gtMetricNames.push_back("Amount of oversegmentation (%)");
00139                 gtMetricNames.push_back("Amount of non-classification (%)");
00140 
00141                 generateGTPlots(vecGtMetrics,noOfGtMetrics,gtMetricNames,"GT Region","GT-metrics based comparison");
00142 
00143                 //Plotting GT based parametric comparison
00144 
00145                 generateParametericPlots(vecGtMetrics,noOfGtMetrics,gtMetricNames,"GT-overall comparison");
00146 
00147                 //Plotting MS based metric comparison
00148 
00149                 boost::split(vecSeperatedMsMetrics, vecMsMetrics[0][0], boost::is_any_of(","));
00150                 noOfMsMetrics = vecSeperatedMsMetrics.size();
00151                 msMetricNames.push_back("Occupacy_of_the_region");
00152                 msMetricNames.push_back("Wrong_Classification(%)");
00153                 msMetricNames.push_back("No_of_undersegmented_regions");
00154                 msMetricNames.push_back("Amount_of_undersegmentation(%)");
00155                 msMetricNames.push_back("Amount_of_noise-classification(%)");
00156                 generateParametericPlots(vecMsMetrics,noOfMsMetrics,msMetricNames,"MS-metrics based comparison");
00157                 //remove temp files
00158 
00159                 for(int i=1; i<noOfGtMetrics; i++){
00160                         stringstream temp;
00161                         temp<<"histData"<<i;
00162                         remove(temp.str().c_str());
00163                 }
00164 
00165         }
00166         else {
00167                 cout << "File Read Error" << endl;
00168         }
00169 }

00171 void Comparator::generateParametericPlots(vector<string> *vecMetrics, int noOfMetrics, vector<string> vecmetricNames,string nameOfFile){
00172 
00173         int noOfRegions;
00174         ofstream tempFile;
00175         vector<string> vecSeperatedMetrics;
00176         stringstream queryString;
00177         Gnuplot g1;
00178         g1.reset_all();
00179         g1.savetops(nameOfFile);
00180 
00181         vector<string> vecParametersOfComparison;
00182         vecParametersOfComparison.push_back("Mean");
00183         vecParametersOfComparison.push_back("Median");
00184         //vecParametersOfComparison.push_back("Variance");
00185         vecParametersOfComparison.push_back("Standard deviation");
00186 
00187         for(int i=1; i<noOfMetrics; i++){
00188                 double mean,median,variance,stdDeviation;
00189                 double *values;
00190                 int yrange=1;
00191                 //create temporary file to create the histogram data
00192                 queryString.str("");
00193                 queryString.clear();
00194                 queryString<<"histData"<<i;
00195                 tempFile.open(queryString.str().c_str());
00196                 tempFile.precision(5);
00197 
00198                 //for every method to be compared calculate the values
00199                 for(unsigned int methodCount=0; methodCount<vecMethodNames.size(); methodCount++){
00200                         noOfRegions = vecMetrics[methodCount].size();
00201                         values = new double[noOfRegions];
00202 
00203                         for(int j=0; j<noOfRegions;j++){
00204                                 boost::split(vecSeperatedMetrics, vecMetrics[methodCount][j], boost::is_any_of(","));
00205                                 values[j]= atof(vecSeperatedMetrics[i].c_str());
00206                         }
00207 
00208 
00209                         //Calculate Mean
00210                         mean = calculateMean(values,noOfRegions);
00211                         //Calculate Median
00212                         median = calculateMedian(values,noOfRegions);
00213                         //Calculate Variance
00214                         variance = calculateVariance(values,noOfRegions);
00215                         //calculate Standard Deviation
00216                         stdDeviation = calculateStdDeviation(values,noOfRegions);
00217                         //find the yRange of the plot
00218                         int tempRange = (int)(mean+ median+ stdDeviation);
00219                         if(yrange < tempRange ) yrange = tempRange;
00220                         //create histogram file
00221                         tempFile<< vecMethodNames[methodCount] << " "<< fixed <<mean<< " " << fixed <<median<< " " << fixed << stdDeviation << endl;
00222                 }
00223 
00224                 tempFile.close();
00225 
00226                 //initialise the gnuplot object
00227 
00228 
00229                 g1.reset_plot();
00230                 g1.set_grid();
00231 
00232                 queryString.str("");
00233                 queryString.clear();
00234                 queryString << "[" << vecmetricNames[i]<<"] over all Regions";
00235                 g1.set_title(queryString.str());
00236 
00237                 g1.set_xlabel("Method Names");
00238 
00239                 queryString.str("");
00240                 queryString.clear();
00241                 queryString << "set yrange [0:" << yrange+1 << "]";
00242                 g1.cmd(queryString.str());
00243 
00244                 g1.cmd("set boxwidth 0.30 absolute");
00245                 g1.cmd("set style fill solid 1.00 border -1").cmd("set style histogram rowstacked gap 4");
00246                 g1.cmd("set style data histograms");
00247                 g1.set_legend("outside right top");
00248                 g1.cmd("set xtic rotate by -45 scale 0");
00249 
00250         queryString.str("");
00251         queryString.clear();
00252         queryString<<"plot 'histData"<<i << "' using ";
00253 
00254         unsigned int parameterCount=0;
00255         queryString <<2 <<":xtic(1)t \"" << vecParametersOfComparison[parameterCount] <<"\"";
00256         for(parameterCount =1; parameterCount<= vecParametersOfComparison.size()-1; parameterCount++){
00257                 queryString<<", '' using "<<(parameterCount+2)<< "t \"" << vecParametersOfComparison[parameterCount]<<"\"";
00258         }
00259         queryString<<endl;
00260         //cout<< "\n\n" <<queryString.str()<<endl;
00261         g1.cmd(queryString.str());
00262         g1.reset_plot();
00263         }
00264 
00265 }

00267 
00268 double Comparator::calculateMean(double *values, int sizeOfArray){
00269 
00270         double mean = 0.0;
00271 
00272         for(int i =0; i < sizeOfArray; i++){
00273                 mean += values[i];
00274         }
00275 
00276         mean = mean/sizeOfArray;
00277 
00278         return mean;
00279 }
00280 
00281 double Comparator::calculateMedian(double *values, int sizeOfArray){
00282 
00283         double median=0.0,temp;
00284 
00285         for(int i=0; i<sizeOfArray-1; i++){
00286                 for(int j=i+1; j<sizeOfArray; j++){
00287                         if(values[j] < values[i])
00288                         {
00289                                 temp=values[i]  ;
00290                                 values[i]=values[j];
00291                                 values[j]=temp;
00292                         }
00293                 }
00294         }
00295 
00296         if(sizeOfArray%2==0)
00297                 return((values[sizeOfArray/2]+values[sizeOfArray/2-1])/2.0);
00298         else
00299                 return values[sizeOfArray/2];
00300 
00301         return median;
00302 }
00303 
00304 double Comparator::calculateVariance(double *values, int sizeOfArray){
00305 
00306         double variance=0.0,mean;
00307 
00308         mean = calculateMean(values,sizeOfArray);
00309 
00310         for (int i =0; i<sizeOfArray; i++){
00311 //              cout<< i<< " : "<<mean << " : "<<values[i]-mean << " : " << (values[i]-mean)*(values[i]-mean)<< "\n";
00312                 variance += (values[i]-mean)*(values[i]-mean);
00313         }
00314 
00315         variance = variance/sizeOfArray;
00316 
00317         return variance;
00318 }
00319 
00320 double Comparator::calculateStdDeviation(double *values, int sizeOfArray){
00321         double variance = calculateVariance(values,sizeOfArray);
00322         return sqrt(variance);
00323 }

00325 void Comparator::generateGTPlots(vector<string> *vecMetrics, int noOfMetrics, vector<string> metricNames,string regionType,string nameOfFile){
00326 
00327         int noOfRegions=vecMetrics[0].size();
00328         stringstream queryString;
00329         Gnuplot g1;
00330 
00331         g1.reset_all();
00332         g1.savetops(nameOfFile);
00333 
00334         for(int i=1; i<noOfMetrics;i++){
00335 
00336                 ofstream tempFile;
00337                 queryString.str("");
00338                 queryString.clear();
00339                 queryString<<"histData"<<i;
00340                 tempFile.open(queryString.str().c_str());
00341                 vector<string> vecSeperatedMetrics;
00342                 for (int j =0; j< noOfRegions; j++){
00343                         boost::split(vecSeperatedMetrics, vecMetrics[0][j], boost::is_any_of(","));
00344                         tempFile.precision(2);
00345                         tempFile<< "Reg." <<j+1<<"("<<fixed<<atof(vecSeperatedMetrics[0].c_str()) << "%) ";
00346                         for(unsigned int methodCount=0; methodCount<vecMethodNames.size();methodCount++){
00347                                 boost::split(vecSeperatedMetrics, vecMetrics[methodCount][j], boost::is_any_of(","));
00348                                 tempFile<< vecSeperatedMetrics[i].c_str() << " ";
00349                         }
00350                         tempFile<<endl;
00351                 }
00352                 tempFile.close();
00353                 g1.reset_plot();
00354                 g1.set_grid();
00355                 queryString.str("");
00356                 queryString.clear();
00357                 queryString<<"Comparing Algorithms in terms of: " << metricNames[i];
00358                 g1.set_title(queryString.str());
00359                 g1.set_ylabel(metricNames[i]);
00360                 g1.set_xlabel("GT Regions");
00361                 g1.cmd("set style fill solid 1.00 border -1").cmd("set style histogram clustered gap 4");
00362                 g1.cmd("set style data histograms");
00363                 g1.set_legend("outside right top");
00364                 g1.cmd("set xtic rotate by -45 scale 0");
00365                 queryString.str("");
00366                 queryString.clear();
00367                 queryString<<"plot 'histData"<<i << "' using ";
00368                 unsigned int methodCount=0;
00369                 queryString <<2 <<":xtic(1)t \"" << vecMethodNames[methodCount] <<"\"";
00370                 for(methodCount =1; methodCount<= vecMethodNames.size()-1; methodCount++){
00371                         queryString<<", '' using "<<(methodCount+2)<< " t \"" << vecMethodNames[methodCount]<<"\"";
00372                 }
00373                 queryString<<endl;
00374                 g1.cmd(queryString.str());
00375                 g1.reset_plot();
00376         }
00377 
00378 }
